activities: BlackLine provides a hosted service to its customers which allows its customers to store and process various types of information via the web.  BlackLine personnel access this information only upon request by the customer, and only for the purpose of assisting the customer in the use of the BlackLine hosted service.  Any access to personal information by BlackLine is subject to a strict obligation of confidentiality between BlackLine and its customer.  BlackLine does not routinely perform any processes or operations related to data stored by its customers other than processes related to the operation of BlackLine’s data center.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: BlackLine elects to cooperate and comply with the European Union and Swiss Data Protection Authorities
